amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute, to modernize Federal food safety efforts without placing unnecessary burdens on food producers, increasing food prices, or saddling taxpayers with additional debt.

action.text: Coburn motion to suspend Rule XXII to permit the consideration of Amendment SA 4696 not agreed to by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 62. Record Vote Number: 256.

Coburn motion to suspend Rule XXII to permit the consideration of amendment SA 4696 made in Senate. In the nature of a substitute, to modernize Federal food safety efforts without placing unnecessary burdens on food producers, increasing food prices, or saddling taxpayers with additional debt.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Coburn motion to suspend Rule XXII to permit the consideration of Amendment SA 4696 not agreed to by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 62. Record Vote Number: 256.
